data.lyric:
[ti:Santa Tell Me]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:Santa Tell Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Santa Tell Me - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)
[00:02.74]Lyrics by：Ilya Salmanzadeh/Savan Kotecha/Ariana Grande
[00:05.48]Composed by：Ilya Salmanzadeh/Savan Kotecha/Ariana Grande
[00:08.22]Produced by：Ilya Salmanzadeh
[00:10.96]Santa tell me if you're really there
[00:15.05]Don't make me fall in love again if he won't be here next year
[00:20.99]Santa tell me if he really cares
[00:25.03]'Cause I can't give it all away if he won't be here next year
[00:31.32]Feeling Christmas all around
[00:33.71]And I'm trying to play it cool
[00:36.22]But it's hard to focus when I see him walking 'cross the room
[00:41.10]"Let It Snow" is blasting out
[00:43.73]But I won't get in the mood
[00:46.22]I'm avoiding every mistletoe until I know it's
[00:50.42]True love that he thinks of
[00:54.31]So next Christmas I'm not all alone boy
[01:00.92]Santa tell me if you're really there
[01:04.95]Don't make me fall in love again if he won't be here next year
[01:10.97]Santa tell me if he really cares
[01:15.00]'Cause I can't give it all away if he won't be here next year
[01:21.20]I've been down this road before
[01:23.73]Fell in love on Christmas night
[01:26.25]But on New Year's Day I woke up and he wasn't by my side
[01:31.15]Now I need someone to hold
[01:33.73]Be my fire in the cold
[01:36.28]But it's hard to tell if this is just a fling or if it's
[01:40.46]True love that he thinks of
[01:44.35]So next Christmas I'm not all alone boy
[01:50.91]Santa tell me if you're really there
[01:55.01]Don't make me fall in love again if he won't be here next year
[02:00.95]Santa tell me if he really cares
[02:05.03]'Cause I can't give it all away if he won't be here next year
[02:12.31]Oh I wanna have him beside me like oh-woo-oh
[02:17.15]On the 25th by that fireplace oh-woo-oh
[02:22.18]But I don't want a new broken heart
[02:25.41]This year I've got to be smart
[02:29.63]Oh baby
[02:30.68]Santa tell me Santa tell me
[02:34.43]If he will be if he will be here
[02:36.40]Santa tell me Santa tell me
[02:39.42]Oh woah
[02:40.96]Santa tell me
[02:42.17]Santa tell me
[02:42.78]If you're really there
[02:44.62]'Cause I really care
[02:45.32]Don't make me fall in love again if he won't be here next year
[02:50.95]Santa tell me
[02:52.22]Tell me
[02:52.60]If he really cares
[02:54.54]Tell me boy
[02:55.23]'Cause I can't give it all away if he won't be here next year
[03:00.96]Santa tell me
[03:02.20]Tell me
[03:02.54]If you're really there
[03:04.42]Santa baby
[03:05.33]Don't make me fall in love again if he won't be here next year
[03:09.01]If he won't be if he won't be here
[03:11.00]Santa tell me
[03:12.09]Tell me
[03:12.49]If he really cares
[03:14.57]Do you care
[03:15.09]'Cause I can't give it all away if he won't be here next year
data.trans:
[ti:Santa Tell Me]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:Santa Tell Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.74]//
[00:05.48]//
[00:08.22]//
[00:10.96]圣诞老人告诉我吧 是否你真的存在
[00:15.05]别再让我陷入爱河了 如果他明年不会来
[00:20.99]圣诞老人告诉我吧 是否他真的在乎
[00:25.03]因为明年我再也无法继续付出我所有了
[00:31.32]到处都是圣诞的气氛
[00:33.71]我真的没办法装得不在乎
[00:36.22]当我看他走过这间房时真的很难专注
[00:41.10]到处都在放 Let It Snow这首歌
[00:43.73]但我仍无法投入这景致中
[00:46.22]我会躲着每株槲寄生
[00:50.42]直到我明白他也向往真爱
[00:54.31]所以下一个圣诞 我就不会孤单一人了
[01:00.92]圣诞老人告诉我吧 是否你真的存在
[01:04.95]别再让我陷入爱河了 如果他明年不会来
[01:10.97]圣诞老人告诉我吧 是否他真的在乎
[01:15.00]因为明年我再也无法继续付出我所有了
[01:21.20]曾经也经历过这种感受
[01:23.73]在圣诞节夜晚坠入爱河
[01:26.25]但新年的夜晚 醒来时却发现他不在我身旁
[01:31.15]此刻我需要温暖的拥抱
[01:33.73]做严寒时温暖我的热火
[01:36.28]我也很难分清这是他一时冲动
[01:40.46]还是他内心渴望的真爱
[01:44.35]所以下一个圣诞 我就不会孤单一人了
[01:50.91]圣诞老人告诉我吧 是否你真的存在
[01:55.01]别再让我陷入爱河了 如果他明年不会来
[02:00.95]圣诞老人告诉我吧 是否他真的在乎
[02:05.03]因为明年我再也无法继续付出我所有了
[02:12.31]我希望他能在我身边
[02:17.15]在圣诞夜一起守在壁炉旁
[02:22.18]但我不想再次心碎
[02:25.41]今年我一定要放聪明点
[02:29.63]宝贝
[02:30.68]圣诞老人告诉我吧 圣诞老人告诉我吧
[02:34.43]他是否会出现 他是否会出现
[02:36.40]圣诞老人告诉我吧 圣诞老人告诉我吧
[02:39.42]//
[02:40.96]圣诞老人告诉我吧
[02:42.17]圣诞老人告诉我吧
[02:42.78]是否你真的存在
[02:44.62]因为我真的在乎
[02:45.32]别再让我陷入爱河了 如果他明年不会来
[02:50.95]圣诞老人告诉我吧
[02:52.22]告诉我吧
[02:52.60]是否他真的在乎
[02:54.54]告诉我吧亲爱的
[02:55.23]因为明年我再也无法继续付出我所有了
[03:00.96]圣诞老人告诉我吧
[03:02.20]告诉我吧
[03:02.54]是否你真的存在
[03:04.42]圣诞老人我的宝贝
[03:05.33]别再让我陷入爱河了 如果他明年不会来
[03:09.01]如果他明年不会来 如果他明年不会来
[03:11.00]圣诞老人告诉我吧
[03:12.09]告诉我吧
[03:12.49]是否他真的在乎
[03:14.57]你是否真的在乎
[03:15.09]因为明年我再也无法继续付出我所有了
